alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 2:58AM MDT until April 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
